novel Auto - Encoder Matching model.from sentence: To address this problem , we propose a novel Auto - Encoder Matching model to learn utterance - level dependency .

two auto- encoders.from sentence: First , motivated by , we use two auto- encoders to learn the semantic representations of inputs and responses in an unsupervised style .

utterance - level representations.from sentence: Second , given the utterance - level representations , the mapping module is taught to learn the utterance - level dependency .
